column4: Hello, in removing nVidia or AMD/ATi drivers from Ubuntu is all you do is go in to additional drivers and remove it and restart?
Or is that more too it in need of switching card manufactors ? (I'm going from a nVidia to an ATi)
sure. You will only need to restart the x server. No need to reboot
